about_the_game:
"Morimens" is a roguelite card-battling game set in a world inspired by the Cthulhu mythos. Within the game, you will connect with a diverse array of awaker, each with distinct personalities, to construct a unique strategic deck tailored to your playstyle. Venture into the misty expanse of the game's map, confront unpredictable events, savor the tactical thrill of card-based combat, and progressively unravel the bizarre and maddening truths that lie at the heart of your investigation.

【Worldview】

The world is dying, yet its inhabitants remain blissfully unaware.
Confronted with a covert, indescribable calamity, you shall take on the role of Keeper, awakening powers intertwined with the very doom threatening existence. You will link yourself with anthropomorphic weapons teetering on the precipice of madness, to withstand this monumental crisis.
If all is destined to be forgotten, would you bear the burden of secrets as testament to the world's existence, forging ahead into the unknown?
May tombstones stand as evidence, and may the Silver Key guide our way.
Welcome to Mythag University, Keeper.

【Game Features】

● A unique art style, accompanied by a diverse cast of characters, and a plethora of designs derived from the Cthulhu mythos, catering to your eclectic tastes and preferences!




● Four fundamental realms serve as the game's backdrop, complemented by an ever-expanding library of over 185 cards, with more being added continually. This extensive array fosters a wealth of playstyles, offering both breadth and depth in strategic options. It empowers you to construct decks freely, reveling in the strategic delight of overcoming great odds with clever tactics!




● Lightweight rogue-lite, low barrier to entry, yet highly replayable! Get started effortlessly and enjoy endless gameplay variety!
Map events, loot drops, card buffs, shop refreshes... each round presents a uniquely shifting battlefield with fresh surprises and challenges awaiting at every turn!
Character progression outside of battles, deck building strategies, in-game death resistance mechanics, and quick-witted adaptability ensure a more manageable, relaxed, and user-friendly experience for newcomers!




● Heart-rending storylines accompanied by evocative soundtracks lead players through episodic narratives that gradually descend into the mad truth and the abyss, portraying a gallery of human nature amidst despair and the flickering light of hope.


● Engage in solo tower-climbing challenges that push your strategic thinking to the limit; meanwhile, the PvP mode subverts solo mode with brand-new card effects and mechanics. There's no need for prolonged character development – jump right in and enjoy the thrill of fair and balanced combat!

A Message from the Development Team

Thank you for venturing into the world of "Morimens"! Nothing brings us greater joy than having you experience our game. If you enjoy "Morimens" or have any feedback about your experience, please do share it with us!
Though this world may be fraught with peril, we are delighted to have crossed paths.
May the Silver Key guide our way.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64位以及更高版本
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 或 AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • VR Support: 不支持

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB 或 AMD Radeon RX 580

short_description: Morimens is a roguelite card-building game inspired by the Cthulhu mythos, where you craft a versatile and intricate deck tailored to your playstyle. The choice is yours to embark on a climb up treacherous towers or engage in tactical battles. Explore misty maps and uncover the truth of the world.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Indonesian, Japanese, Thai, Portuguese - Portugal, Vietnamese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
